func.title: VIS_Owner
func.desc: Constant for GetVisibility/SetVisibility. The object is visible for its owner.
func.remark: This value is also defined as a constant. Thus the parameter brackets can be omitted.

example.code: for(var obj in FindObjects(Find_OCF(OCF_CrewMember))) SetVisibility(VIS_Owner, obj);
example.text: Makes all selected clonks visible for their owners only.
